review_text: Finding that is not as good as Google for controlling my devices hopefully they will work on it and fix it. Not so good anymore
Good product!. I gave it as a gift and she loves it!
Five Stars. I love except it makes a bleeping noise like a couple to 3 times per minute. Is this normal??????
Manufacturing error. After the first two pullsthe rest came in a ball.it would appear to be a manufacturing error. Other then that appear to be ok. We will see what the next box brings for a followup

Great for Truck Drivers. I'm a small guy at 165lbs, so it took some breaking in for this cushion to finally give my hamstrings some relief...but now, I can't drive without it. If you're a truck driver and you're looking for a cushion, this is the one you want to get as all others WON'T cover the dimensions of the factory truck seat.

Did not help my allergies. This purifier worked well for a month or so, but it did not really help my allergies very much. I never bothered to buy a new filter for it because of this and it ended up in the garbage
No. Did nothing extra for me.  Granted I had my doubts but thought I would give it a try on stubborn stains - no help to me.

it is like fleece and they charge you almost the price of .... quality is so so. it is like fleece and they charge you almost the price of the product for return. I anted to return it after seeing the quality but couldn't looking at the return policy, so was forced to keep it. I will use it for moping the floor.
Powerful and really simple to use.. Use this to watch streaming television like Netflix, Hulu and Amazon Prime vids.

Travelers must buy this. Anyone camping or traveling should carry this in their pack. It is a life saver when no soap is available and great when the only soap available has perfume that gives you a headache. This is head ache free as far as I can tell.

Poor mic. If you received/dialled a call using phone directly, and switched to this Bluetooth device after 10 seconds of conversation, person at other end will hear you okay. But if you do the same in Bluetooth mode, the person at the other end will not hear your voice.

Not quite what I had hoped for. While this filter works ok, it is noticeably more flimsy than the one that came with my coffee maker.  And the lift handle on it does not always stay in the groove on the top side of the filter, causing the handle to drop down into the coffee grounds.  I was a bit disappointed with the quality of this one, expecting it to be identical to my original one.
Sending back. More costly than cable, or dish. Very costly. You have to pay for each app.

Counterfeit even if from Amazon. Mine was counterfeit. I purposely bought some from Samsung along with these, thinking that I go through one every half year, they store fine, and so I had nothing to lose.  These are substantially different in mass, printing/wording and design, etc.  It looks like Amazon has counterfeit stock.
If you like them rough. they are extremely scratchy and rough.  I was looking for something a little softer.  If you like them rough, then you'll like these.

Meh.. Like others, I was disappointed with this cushion and ended up returning it within 24 hrs. Cushy & soft-yet-firm? Check.  But not cool, and it actually hampered blood flow to my legs no matter how I sat on it or positioned myself. Too expensive to be so mediocre.
Three Stars. Still trying it out
Cute necklace. Really cut. I take off pendant for different look.
Bug Off!. I used to be a bug buffet, but no more. This stuff works! Nice fragrance and lightweight. Highly recommend!
Buy. Good product
Four Stars. Doesn't spray correctly.
Three and a half stars. 3 1/2 stars. Not sure this will hold up under many washes,  good thing I'm clean when I put it on!  The edges are curling up making the Velcro not-so-comfey.
Keeps our animal room fresh!. This air freshener is perfect for a room we have a bunny rabbit in! It takes all the smell away! Great product for the money!
One Star. "Quirkiest" trackball I've ever used.

hate this tablet 10 " is what im used to slow to charge, no alexa working, sending back asap.. cannot get ALEXA to work. brand new tab. took 6 hours to fully charge. no google mail. no free phone calls u just use this fire tab to speak thru using your own connection. hate it. sending back. bad experience overall.

These are great, discreet. I wish I had started wearing ear protection to raves sooner! These are great, discreet, and comfortable. They block out the crappy noise and I can hear.my boyfriend talk without him having to scream in my ear. The first time I was the only one wearing them, I could hear him but he couldn't hear me. I let him try them and he was impressed. We bought him his own pair.
Good if you have the right textured tub!. It doesn't stick properly if you don't have porcelain. It's too bad because it really works but my shower has a rough texture!
Recipes. Having recipes displayed making cooking so much easier.
Two Stars. Can’t hear at all with these.

MAYBE THIS IS THE CRUCIAL INGREDIENT. I don't know. The crucial test of what they do and how well they do it seems to be that you can heat up the remainder of your pot of coffee later in the day or in the evening, and still you won't get any bitter or acid taste. Is that it?

What do the other Amazons say? I say, "Works for me."

... so long to brew the coffee is lukewarm at best. Have switched to regular cone filters available at .... These filters take a so long to brew the coffee is lukewarm at best.  Have switched to regular cone filters available at the grocery store for considerably less money and they work fine.

Not getting he curls. Hard to curl my hair even if i am following the video or maybe my hair is just to silky it would have been good to also have a clip together
Gloves was good to have
Didnot give me the curls i wanted but maybe it was not just for my hair
So hard to find large tea cases like this.  Nice and roomy for larger pitchers. A screw or some type of mechanism to keep the cap on would have been great.

They allow coffee grinds into the cup no matter what type of grind I use.. Allows grounds and ‘silt’ into my coffee. Always finding particles of coffee in the bottom of my cup. I grind my own coffee and no matter how fine or coarse I grind it, these filters always seem to let through coffee grind. Unhappy with them.
Leaked in box. Came leaky
Dispenser issues. Dispenser cap sticks and eventually breaks off so now cannot control drops well.
Could be better. Brand name is printed on sliding cover.  Kinda ruins it.  No complaints other than that.
Nice smell. Nice smell,  works well
Really  remove stains. Took all stains out off clothes, then other brands
Poor design. Poor design. Raised bottom reduces capacity for grinds. Too much filter surface area allows fast water flow, hence weak coffee. Had to return.
Great no more painful wipes and no more money. Look no more red nose! But, no more money for the love of tissues please

Dead spot on screen now....5 weeks after warranty expired.. Used only to listen to books at night...barely used. Am dissatisfied with this product. I have hardly used this.

On the right side of the screen there is a dead zone about the size of a business card. Only found out when i went to play a game.
Nice. Love it

Sound quality is terrible. I like everything about the Echo Show 5 except the sound quality.  I sent the first one back and had Amazon send another. The sound quality is the same. The sound has to much Bass and too muffled. Echo Dot has a crisp sound and easily understandable. It’s hard to understand the Echo Show 5. Very disappointing.

Tall but works good.. This does work as it describes but it makes the bottle of mouthwash very tall. The pump sticks up very high from the bottle. This makes it so it can’t sit on most shelves. Other than this it works great.
Best Hairspray Ever!. Doesn't stink like other brands and holds my hair on place without looking sticky.
Four Stars. Far as I can tell, these are ok.
Don't clean up well. These easily tarnish & really hard to scrub burned food from. After I replaced them twice I switched to a porcelain set.
You get what you pay for.. The quality isn't that great but its expected because of the price.
Its ok.. I have been using this shampoo for about two weeks now and I do not see a difference in my hair. I have very thin frizzy hair and I was hoping this would help the frizz. It did not.
It appears to read 20 lbs high.. This scale is a liar.
These cups work good. Sometimes we have to hold down the cover .... These cups work good.  Sometimes we have to hold down the cover after the cup is inserted, but don't mind it.

TERRIBLE CHANGE to CASE. I've used this product happily for more than 5 years.  But they have now RUINED the case by changing it from color coded to mono-color.  What the crap were they thinking??  There CANNOT be a logical reason for this blunder.
Forever to heat up. Not really what I expected as far as heat up time and it just didn’t really give my hair the look I wanted. I think it just doesn’t get hot enough.

Expensive but worth the investment. Sitting for long periods of time in my office caused leg and butt pain. This cushion provides good support and eases the pain. The price definitely gave me pause but the return policy made it worth trying. Glad I did!  Highly recommend!
GREAT PRODUCT. Does just what it says it does. Love it. Gonna order another one right now.

once installed the water had bad aftertaste - sent it back. had to send it back - it is easy to install but the water had an after taste once installed - i did reset my refrigerator filter button a few times but still had a aftertaste

Leaking when received....EVERY TIME I've ordered it.. This is the 3rd time I've ordered this.  It has been damaged or leaking EVERY time.  Someone isn't doing quality control very well.  Can't find it at any stores including Publix, Wal-Mart, Kroger, Ingles, etc.
Waste. They don’t separate well so when my daughter would try to get one, she would end up with ten.
Average butterfly clamps. There ok clamps the seem a bit cheaply made but overall they work well for holding hair.
Okay. Great for needing quick to use. Think there’s better ones out there but still good
Not worth it. The product description wasn’t clear enough about which mouth wash containers this fits. I would have returned it but it wasn’t worth my time for a $6 item.
Need this. Love reading on it! Great tablet, does everything! Good!
Five Stars. Gets out all sorts of stains!
Excellent speaker. Great sound, great connectivity.
Don't recommend using this with Chemex. I've been using a straw with this to allow hot air to escape.  I prefer the Chemex filter or the stainless steel filter more than this.
Love it. Happy with this item

Tangles my hair. I really wanted to like this . Really. It smells amazing and has great stuff in it, but I have thick curly long hair and it doesn't sud well AT ALL. It also makes my hair all tangled. Definitely needs conditioner to pare . For me.

Died after 2 months.. Love this earphone but one side stop working after using for 2 months.
I bought 3 of them and this is the only one that broke that fast. I guess this is just the unlucky one then.
Value for money. I use these to do virtual exercise classes as well as to listen to music on my iPhone. They work perfectly!

Decent device. Could use improvements. The device is almost everything you wanted from a device. It’s sleek, it’s durable, and easy to set up. I wish there was more integration with YouTube tv. The device is also a bit heavy for my hdmi ports. It’s an older tv but it couldn’t keep the device applied without slacking
Works well.  But nite it does not support power use monitoring.. Great when on sale.  Wish it had power monitoring capability
Will Not Stay in Place. Will not stay in place on back on chair!
Fiddly... But coffee is decent.. It's a lot more work than a french press... so I never really use it... but it's an interesting concept and design.
Four Stars. Seems to work
Strong and soft. Good for makeup removal
Works great!. Works great!
Five Stars. A+

Works great, easy to clean. I am not sure what type of Keurig I have but this works great in it!  It sits up high enough so it does not get punctured like a regular k-cup does.  I would recommend this product.  Works great and easy to clean.  Like that the bottom is screen like the sides.

Disposable tablets. I bought 5 of these and gave as gifts.  They lasted a few months, now 2 of them won't charge or turn on.  Went through a good portion of a day attempting to get help with this issue through Amazon, no luck.  The 2 different people I chatted with couldn't give me any helpful tech advice and they are out of warranty.
Three Stars. Okay.
Good. I like that i can play my netflix on my tv with it but i'm still learning to work it. I like it so far.

These were exactly as described and work great. I would recommend these and will buy more .... I use these for various things including hanging up wigs and for chipbag clips. These were exactly as described and work great. I would recommend these and will buy more when needed.
It's Awesome.. This Best firestick I ever bought on Amazon, just wish it had USB connection on it.

Arrived with stones missing. Two stones were in the bag that the tiara came in. It was a cheap tiara (price) but since more than one stone was out I don't have high hopes for durability. It is also noticeable that the stones are missing. I would not recommend.

Lotion separates from the insect oil. I've purchased for international S. America and Vietnam travel.  When it pours the lotion separates from the insect oil and I have a tough time getting to two to meld.
It is ok. This product does not leave a white residue like got to be clue spray but does not hold better than the got to be glue spray

Works. Works as described.  Bit expensive for the time it lasts and you would think for this kind of money it'll be cleaned.  Nope.  Have to waste a whole tray (and a day) of making black/gray ice before ice can be used.

Damaged. The box that the item came in was damaged, so I already feared that the product was going to be damaged as well. Little did I know, it was. It’s not fully attached on the right side, I thought about just gluing it but then that would be a waste because I paid for a product but my satisfaction was not guaranteed. It took about a week to get delivered.
Two Stars. makes colored water..... too weak for coffee even when filled.

The filters look and feel very close to the original .... The filters look and feel very close to the original, but when you soak the filter in water and try to clear out the coal dust, just as you do for the original, it just does not work, water still cloudy with dust.
At some point you just stop trying and use it and hope it will not cause a health problem.

Fake. I agree with other reviews, calling fake in this one.  I’ve used this product for a long time and love it however, this is not it!  Does not smell the same and does not hold my style AT ALL!!!  I’m about half way through the first can and will throw both away (bought 2 pack) and go buy the real thing.
Perfect fit. Works as expected.
Four Stars. No complaints.
One Star. Arrived not working.

I'm not sure if it would be cheaper to buy .... I'm not sure if it would be cheaper to buy the regular cone shape filters but my friend says that you got to have these for the Chemex so that's what I but I'm going to go ahead and buy some of the other ones and I will update you later as to which one works better

Fire Stick Works great but can interfere with TV antenna if you're using one. Oct 2017 Review Update:  Amazon has done a great job updating the Fire Stick software, and all of my complaints from my initial review have been fixed.  The Menus and Voice Interface are intuitive, easy to use, and do what you'd expect.
Nice quality. Nice gift for Angel tree
handy. very handy to be on key chain, and it light weight.
Coffee scoop works great. Measures the correct amount of coffee and easy to use. I waste a lot less coffee.

Great Buy!. These lashes are so pretty and natural! they have a good curl and flare and they look very real. the band is easy to use and apply. although the lash band is literally thread. and the lashes are very fragile and are easily damaged. I had trouble taking them out. but other than that, the lashes are great for the price! Fast shipping too
Great. Granddaughter loves it sound is great
Rinse well after soaking in this. be sure to rinse contacts really well with saline before putting in your contact
Three Stars. wipes are small need to be a little bit bigger but my little one loves them

Dirty little clean magnet that won't bring your wildest dreams true. For a couple who is on the best day at least considering where dirty dishes go this is a godsend.  I cannot give it a 5 star review though because it did not fix my lazyness.  Now I forget to flip it so it says dirty when the dishes are clean or clean when the dishes are dirty.  Also it doesn't self load my dishwasher.
Not what i wantef. I have a son with speech impediment. Didn't pick him up at al
Didn't fit. Really didn't fit my stove
Not worth it. Poor quality

It's Ok.. It's ok.  Not very consistent person to person.  Some times it has a 40lb swing.  Novel idea.  Not sure it is worth the $.  I had a hard time getting it to set up properly.  I literally had to set it on the floor next to the wifi box to get it to notice wifi originally.
collapses while drying hair.. Collapses while trying to dry hair.  May be a spacesaver but such a pain.
Good purchase. Great for the price. Got on a lightning deal.

This might be a counterfeit product. The item looks the same as the original, and it is a very simple installation.  But when installed, the message on my fridge said it detected a problem and both water and ice were disabled.  I then purchased the same product at my local Best Buy, and sure enough there was no issue at all, and it functioned properly.
Damaged. Ordered 2 cans of hairspray. Both lids were cracked and one can was only half full and wouldn't spray.

Not compatible with all stove tops. I was so happy when I put the first two pans in and they fit like a glove. The next two did not fit and the burner ended up sitting on top of it. They would have looked great, had they fit.
Fire HD 10 Tablet. Didn't realize you couldn't play games on this device.
Nice filters. Purchased for my Cuisinart dcc-1200 coffee maker that I have had for three years. Necessary if you want clean water for your java.

Love it. If you're tired of spray bottles that soak your hair, your shirt, and leave water running down your face every time you try and wet your hair for styling, this is the product for you. I know that sounds corny, but it is a really good product.
good sound. very nice product. speakers are good. alexa speaks clearly and the picture is nice as well
it isn't good and it isn't bad. Meh, it isn't good and it isn't bad. I like it as a moisturizer. That is about it.
Not Kool enough. I meant to order the cool Kleenex  Those are thicker and way softer
Poor Quality. This item is of such poor quality that I doubt that it will last much more than a month or two. Every time I use it I wonder that the hot water didn't cause it to melt.
Two Stars. It’s beautiful
Five Stars. this stuff really works great makes your hair feel thicker
Not great. They shed bad.. These shed when you use them.
easy to install. So far it's working good  I have no complaints,The water taste good and is coming out at a good pace.

Melted to the dishwasher.... I loved this thing until today when I realized that it melted to the dishwasher. If you get it, make sure to move it around or not do two loads of dishes in a row because apparently it’ll melt? Not really sure when this happened since I have it in the same place all the time. We’re renting this apartment and the melted plastic isn’t coming off easily, so beware.
Very handy for your looseleafs.. Very convenient and well put together.  Definitely beyond worth the price.  It does sometimes worry me that I'm steeping plastic in boiling water.

Great cushion.. After having back surgery late last year I needed something to help ease the pressure on my tailbone.  This cushion, though it feels weird to sit on, works like a champ.  Takes most of the pressure off my tailbone so I can work and sit more comfortably.
Waste of Money. Very cheap!!!! I went and purchased a automatic brush washer.
Very Nice!. I absolutely love this spray bottle. I wanna throw all my cheap plastic spray bottles in the garbage.  It saturate your hair in just a few sprays. Love it!

Don't like the scent or consistency. This dmso is weak, it's greasy and the rose scent irritates my sinuses. I had read reviews saying that the smell was very light but that's not the case. I recently got another brand and I like it much better.

it feels like it is exfoliating. Because of the roughness, it feels like it is exfoliating.  But I noticed when I am removing self tanner after a few days - it does nothing.  Yet, I can use a wet facecloth and take off all the self tanner without a problem.  And the tanner is just on the outer layer of dead skin, which I assume is coming off with the facecloth.
Perfect!. They're perfect in every way....  Glad I brought them.

Good sound quality, Not Durable. Had to drop my review from 5 to 3 stars. I still think the sound quality, volume, and charge on both case and earbuds are fantastic but I'm on my second pair, after one of the buds died after ~6 months, and now one of the buds has again gone almost completely silent after less than 2 months. Pretty disappointed

HELP!!!. Bought a book from amazon days ago and still can't read it on the kindle. have been to u-tube, google, everywhere..no help..the book shows on kindle, but always asks do I want to stop download? I click no. does it take hours to download books? I'm on WIFI...HELP!!!
Suits me fine. I'm enjoying this. I keep it plugged in all the time in my workshop, so I don't know or care how long it holds a charge. Sound quality is more than adequate for my purposes.
Warning. Speakers do not play at the same volume. Who knows how long they will even last if they come out of the box like that
Awesome!. This is my 3rd one. love it! One on every T.V

Not happy with the audio quality. As an audiophile, I think they sounded horrible. The highs we're good, mid and lows were not good. Raised the volume and it sounded distorted. I found that cheaper headphones sounded better. The functions other than audio is great though.
Wasn't worth the buck I paid for it. Well, it didn't last long.
Five Stars. love it
Does not work!. Don't waiste your money! Does not work at all.
My 3rd firestick. Im addicted
Good. Expensive; but, does a good job.
Three Stars. OK product

Whirlpool will not honor a replacement if purchased from Amzone. This is the first issue I am having with this filter, but when we put this one on water leak all over the floor, my husband tried twice, each time he put the old on back there was no issue he put this one in and is is obviously  defective. BUT because I ordered it from Amazon Whirlpool will not honor a replacement.
Great mouse for the price. My wrist stopped hurting after I bought this mouse (Oct 2017).  It just pooped out on me, so I got 1.5 years out of it.  Not bad for the price!
not nearly as good as the squares. not nearly as good as the squares... tends to let the coffee sputter out of the pouring area while pouring hot waster into chemex
Remote didn't work.. Remote would not work. Got a refund and ordered the 4k stick

Not Happy. This was not an samsung replacement but a counterfit.  The one I ordered for a replacement was suppossed to have been mineral water filter. Not fresh water. It should have stated it was not a samsung filter.  The box looked old. It was made in Mexico. My water does not taste as good.
life saver. life saver
BEYOND EXCELLENT!. LOVE MY FIRE TV STICK! SO MANY OPTIONS SO MANY APPS! LOVE ALEXA ON THIS AS WELL! Saves time in searching!
Four Stars. Works as expected.
... seem to work well and maked the water taste funny.. Although the product had the right markings indicating it was made by GE the product doesn't seem to work well and maked the water taste funny.
One Star. The diffuser collapses easily. If I could give it a negative star I would.

Don't make a bit of difference in my home. I put one in my tiny office and another in my living room to help with cigarette smoke and animal odors.  I have not noticed one bit of difference in the smell of my home since I put them in.  I gave them two months, and now of course, cannot return them.  There is absolutely no change in either room and both rooms have no change in the air quality.

Does the job in a small room. Bought this to put in a small empty bedroom where I keep a litter box, it does a good job keeping the air clean. It is a bit noisy, but I don't mind that since it's in an empty room.
Practico. Cabello
Great EarPods. So far these earbuds sound SO much clearer than my older pair. Crystal clear and good sounds depth.

Not bad. Not bad at all. Arrived and was packed well. It holds a decent amount of water. Only issue i have is i wish a portion of the bottle was see thru so that you can gage how much water is left. But love the way this sprays. You can do a quick burst or a long mist. Definitely recommend.
Great hold for short "messy" styles.. Love this hairspray ••• holds all day, can be layered for extra body. Best hairspray I’ve used in years!

They're ok!. Sometimes you regret going cheaper for the sake of a bargain. This is one of those moments. They do the job... nothing fancy. Wish I'd spent more and got better clips but it is what it is.
Inconsistent. It’s great when it works. I just wish that were all the time...
great. great
Too tall. The smaller ones fit perfectly but the larger ones are strangely too tall
Four Stars. great

large drip pans are too large. I like the drip pans and the smaller ones fit fine but the larger size is too big for the opening it is supposed to fit into. It makes the pan sit about a 1/4" above the opening where it should fit tightly.
Caused red inflammation around brows.. Have used before, but this batch is causing red irritation around brows. Did formula change?  I'm throwing out and won't use again.
Not too smooth. Claims to not leave behind lint but definitely leaves behind little bits of fuzz.  Not super absorbent.  Actually feels a little rough.
Bad purchase for me. Bad purchase for me...made my coffee taste nasty.  I know it was the filter because the third pot I made I used a sheet of Bounty paper towel instead and my coffee was yummy.
Too big , not a good look on your dishwasher. Too big for dishwasher , doesn’t look good , took it off , read the dimensions, I over looked them
Awesome product..A+++. Awesome product..my fiance loved her birthday present
Disappointed. It seemed to work great for one minute but the pressure went way down before I even got clear water to come through.
Three Stars. it's a big small
Good idea, Poor manufacturing. These arrived with chips in the rim plastic, love the reusable aspect of the product.  Searching for a better made version for the same.

Good as ring device. I only got this device for my ring doorbell.  The thing I like is it rings on this device. The thing I dislike is how long it takes to show the ring doorbell. I wished that was an automatic feature since it's connected.  At any rate it is ok. Screen is too small for really using for cooking.

Wouldn't buy again. Slow and generally unimpressive. Has more glitches than Gary's mod. Disconnects ALL THE TIME. My echo dot works better. Touch screen has a delay and it seems like this little thing has to think extra hard to do anything.
Smart Device Indeed!!!. Awesome, love all these smart devices. No more turning Christmas tree on. I simply say, Alexa turn on/off Christmas tree!
Get what you pay for.. For what I paid for it. it was a real deal. As for a product, Amazon anything is destined to fail.
Baby safe but doesn’t get stains out. Love the idea but stains don’t come out easy and I don’t like the smell it leaves on clean clothes.
disapointed. this is too small; smaller than the previous 8.9 version

Great when it works, doesn't work for long. Pretty unreliable. I've ordered three of these, and I think the longest I've had one last so far is about eight months. The last one I ordered only lasted three months. It's really a shame that nobody makes reliable trackball devices anymore.
Love. I love the quality of these pads!  Will be purchasing again.  They are soft and absorbent.
Four Stars. works well
Kindle HD Fire 10inch. Something has gone wrong with charging, tried several outlets, it won't go past 55% even overnight.  UGH
Should be better for the Price. This should be way more accurate for the money aslo disappointed with the WiFi signal I have to be nearly right next to my router for it to work...
too big for original keurig. Too big.  The basket over flows when you use this thing.  Defeats the purpose.
Plastic?. I don’t like how there’s plastic. I like the other Puffs boxes!
Easy to apply. Easy to apply, covers very well, and the dark brown isn't too dark.  Looks very natural, didn't run, smudge or smear during application.
One Star. Had to return could use camera

Streaming issues. I can’t speak to all it’s features since I can’t get it to stream more than a few seconds at a time.  It keeps telling me the signal is lost, but when I check my signal through the tv it tells me it is strong... I’m not sure what to do, but not overly thrilled with it.
Two Stars. Cheaply made but does the job.

VERY DISAPPOINTING. I was really looking forward to this tablet to read instead of my defunct Kindle. This thing wouldn't even recognize my Wi-Fi when I was sitting at my desk top computer ONLINE. It kept saying 'no connection' and I'm actively on Amazon.com. Very disappointed to have an issue with this product right out of the package.
Silicone Stove Gap Covers. They don't fit properly.

Cool but nothing to write home about. There is a coolness factor but she loses connection all the time and really doesn't do it anything besides try to get me to subscribe to more services.
Not next happy with her.
but they look like the original one. i haven't used them yet, but they look like the original one.

Takes forever to drip. I usually buy the brown chemex filters. I saw good reviews on these and wanted to try them. It takes 5x as long for the water to drip through. It’s almost like it gets stuck and just sits there. I grind heart coffee on course 20g at a time, it shouldn’t be doing this. Wish I would’ve stuck with my normal filters. And I can’t return them.
Did not make bigger bubbles. Used for huge bubble recipe. Did not work well for that.
Doesn’t work with thick hair. Not for thick hair
Makes big mess of pods.. Very confusing to use with big hole on top.
Poor!. For some reason with this one our water does not get cooled down!
Disappointed. They take way to long to turn one.
Five Stars. Main ingredient in my diy juice for over two years
Remote stopped working. The remote has stopped working even when the batteries have been changed multiple times. It has been less than a year from when I bought it. It’s extremely disappointing.
Easy Install. Install was easy. Havent tasted the water yet but filter had good reviews. Will update after a few glasses of water

Poor quality, does not fit right.  Do not buy this C**P. I bought several times from the other vendors and pans were fine.  this time I bought the cheapest and was punished.  Pans do not fit right... do not buy this!

I dare a company to send me a curler that works better!. 110% recommend! Nothing curls my hair ever BUT bed head curlers! And it stays for days. The pics are from yesturday curls I didn't do anything but wake up and toss it in a pony tail. Do yourself a huge favor and get it!!!!
Not professional grade. It is not professional grade as it states..burnt my hand a few times..
but good product. I normally use straight sugar. Not as rough as I expected, but good product. I normally use straight sugar, so I like a very rough exfoliation.
It as expected. Stopped working. Worst Purchase.
